channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025040001
item.description:
Report X-2025040001

Identified by scraper @ 2025-04-20T00:57:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-29
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared hazmat found during screening. Other undeclared hazmat found with no release as follows. (Replicating questions 14-29) Lithium ion batteries//haz class 9// UN 3480//not shipped as hazardous waste//not toxic by inhalation//not shipped under Exemption, Approval, or CA number//shipment was undeclared with no release//packaging type non-bulk/outer packaging plastic box// I was screening using the x-ray and saw ammos on the shipment. Did physical search as secondary screening and confirmed its ammo

item.title: Report X-2025031462
item.description:
Report X-2025031462

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-29
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Description: WHILE XRAYING SHIPMENT 1PC @ 6LBS DEST ADQ WHAT LOOKED LIKE 3 CANS OF AEROSOLS APPREARED ON XRAY PHYSICALLY SEARCHED AND REMOVED THEM FROM SHIPMENT AWB31552640 BOOKED TO FLT 89/03DEC
